revised_title: Presents List and Scientific Papers from December 5, 1889
tldr: This article presents a comprehensive list of scientific publications and transactions from various societies and institutions, covering topics in chemistry, physics, astronomy, geology, and meteorology. It also includes a summary of papers read at the Royal Society meeting on December 5, 1889, discussing the relation of physiological action to atomic weight and the arrangement of excitable fibers in the internal capsule of the Bonnet Monkey.
